Package comm_infra

Class Room

java.lang.Object
comm_infra.Room
public class Room extends Object
Represent a room Ni of the museum. Keeps data related to distance, number of canvas, if it is assigned or not;

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Room(int id)
    Creates an object of Room and instantiates needed variables and a random number of canvas and a random distance to the room;

      public boolean isAssigned()
      Checks if a room is currently available for stealing or not

    • setAssigned

      public void setAssigned(boolean assigned)
      Sets the state of the room as assigned or not
      Parameters:
      assigned - true or false

    • roll

      public boolean roll()
      Roll a canvas from the room. Set the canvas in the array of canvas as stolen and decrement the number of available canvas

    • isEmpty

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if the room is empty
      Returns:
      a boolean that informs if the current room is empty or not
